    impurity models

    Our work on an auxiliary model-based approach to the Mott MIT is now available on the arxiv.

    In this work, we provide a Hamiltonian-based explanation of the phenomenology of DMFT, obtaining new insights on then MIT along the way.

    Our work on the multichannel Kondo problem is now available on the arxiv.

    In this work, we elucidate the importance of ground-state degeneracy and frustration in determining the physics of the multichannel Kondo model.

    Our work on the single-channel Kondo problem has been published in Phys. Rev. B

    In the work, we study the feedback effect of Kondo cloud screening on the conduction electrons, obtaining an effective Hamiltonian that describes its dynamics.

    Kondo model

    Our work on the single-channel Kondo problem has been published in Phys. Rev. B

    In the work, we study the feedback effect of Kondo cloud screening on the conduction electrons, obtaining an effective Hamiltonian that describes its dynamics.
